text:
The City Administrator shall conduct administrative hearings provided for in the Deemed Approved Off-Sale Alcohol Use Regulations. All requests to the City Administrator by the City Attorney to schedule an administrative hearing shall be accompanied by sufficient information to allow the City Administrator to complete the Notice For Administrative Hearings as described in Section 
26.17. 
(Added by Ord. 43-06, File No. 051792, App. 3/10/2006)

heading.catch_text: OPERATION OF ADMINISTRATIVE HEARINGS BY THE CITY ADMINISTRATOR.
